Eva's Knight Lionel Hunter:
I'll tell you about the second test.
First, you must defeat any monsters in the following hunting zones: Session Zone - Abandoned Coal Mines, Blazing Swamp, Beleth's Magic Circle, Desert Quarry, Phantasmal Ridge, Enchanted Valley, Ivory Tower Crater, Silent Valley, Alligator Island, Tanor Canyon, The Forest of Mirrors, Field of Silence, Isle of Prayer, Breka's Stronghold, Sel Mahum Training Grounds, Plains of the Lizardmen, Fields of Massacre, Wasteland, Fafurion Temple, Dragon Valley until you get 40000 Proof of Resistance.
Also you need reach 102 level. Then return back to me.
